AboutMeSection.paragraph_1: Web developer with proven experience using technologies such as *React.js, TypeScript/JavaScript* for frontend, and *Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, and TypeScript* for backend. In addition, I'm well acquainted with fundamental concepts of software development, such as _clean code, design patterns, hexagonal architecture, data structures, microservices, and unit tests._
AboutMeSection.paragraph_2: Programming has become a real hobby. A good part of my free time is dedicated to reading articles and documentation about the latest technologies. I firmly believe that this constant dedication will propel me towards success in the future.
AboutMeSection.paragraph_3: I stay motivated and am always open to learning new technologies or acquiring new knowledge and experience for my professional growth. My willingness to face challenges and embrace learning opportunities is a trait that constantly drives me on my journey.
